member.name: D2D1_SHARPEN_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Sharpen effect.

member.name: D2D1_SHARPEN_PROP.D2D1_SHARPEN_PROP_SHARPNESS
member.summary: The D2D1_SHARPEN_PROP_SHARPNESS property is a float value indicating how much to sharpen the input image. The allowed range is 0.0 to 10.0. The default value is 0.0.

member.name: D2D1_SHARPEN_PROP.D2D1_SHARPEN_PROP_THRESHOLD
member.summary: The D2D1_SHARPEN_PROP_THRESHOLD property is a float value. The allowed range is 0.0 to 1.0. The default value is 0.0.
